lines.text: Abronoma had been horrible at the chores,
so Big Man is punishing her...
Maame always shudders at the sight,
and has tried to stop Big Man many times
Big Man has told Abronoma to carry the bucket of water from one end of the yard to the other
If Abronoma spills the tiniest amount...
As Abronoma lifts the bucket onto her head,
you see how her entire body starts shaking
she will spill it all and drown herself in the process!
You let out the breath you didn't realize you were holding as Abronoma took the first step
you can learn anything when you have to learn it
You see how Abronoma steadies her legs,
No one is looking for you
Why would they pick such a useless girl?
You will never be a part of this family
You see Abronoma's face is covered in sweat and tears
Big Man's insults are slowly breaking her
Abronoma is walking the final stretch,
it looks like she'll make it
She takes the bucket off of her head,
But as she places it on the ground,
who is at the verge of tears
Make her suffer or you'll fail too!
Make her suffer or you'll fail too!
Make her suffer or you'll fail too!
Make her suffer or you'll fail too!
